transcript:
re- spectfully received the blessing first of one and then of another priest. 
"God be thanked that you are in time," said she to one of the priests; "all we relatives have been in such anxiety. This young man is the count's son," she added more softly. "What a terrible moment!" 
Having said this she went up to the doctor. 
"Dear doctor," said she, "this young man is 
the count's son. Is there any hope?" 
The doctor cast a rapid glance upwards and silently shrugged his shoulders. Anna Mikhiy
